txt.en: 'The wights and the movements of the Dievlig pose a growing threat to the clans of Dunland. Several of our allies are located at Echad Naeglanc, the camp of a northern Duvodiad like yourself, on the southern border of the Bonevales...will you bring word to them and warn them of the danger that the evil ones pose?\n\n'Travel south along the road, then turn due east and travel up the path to Echad Naeglanc.'
'Only a few hours ago, Echad Naeglanc was attacked by the Dievlig. These foul vermin took my friends captive, but I was able to fight them off in the end.'
'Seek out the Ranger-encampment of Echad Naeglanc.'
The wights of the Bonevales and the Dievlig pose a great threat to all the clans of Dunland.
Talk to Haul at Echad Naeglanc
Echad Naeglanc lies to the south and east of Bledhun's camp.\n\nBledhun has asked you to warn his allies regarding the evil ones who dwell in the Bonevales.
